definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The hypocenter and Atom Bomb Dome are visible at top center.
sentences.chinese: 在震源和原子彈圓頂可見頂部中心。

sentences.english: The domed cities and flying cars we expected have failed to materialize.
sentences.chinese: 圓頂城市和會飛的汽車並未出現。

sentences.english: A mat final aspect was chosen for its resemblance to the colour of the zinc domes and pinnacles.
sentences.chinese: 地板最終選擇與鍍鋅圓頂和尖塔相近的顏色。

sentences.english: As stated above, the dome esoterically represents the womb giver of life.
sentences.chinese: 如上所述，祕傳的圓頂代表子宮生命的給予者。

sentences.english: Hong Luo thin Pteris several heavy, Bi Wen night dome slit.
sentences.chinese: 鳳尾香羅薄幾重，碧文圓頂夜深縫。

sentences.english: The system is similar to a previous containment dome plan that failed.
sentences.chinese: 新系統類似於之前失敗的那個堵截圓頂計劃。

sentences.english: Apricot buds open into domed creamy-white rosettes.
sentences.chinese: 杏芽開放進入圓頂奶油白色花環。

sentences.english: The characteristic is the yellowish dome shaped shelter.
sentences.chinese: 日本石龜的特點是稍黃色的和圓頂形狀的龜甲。

sentences.english: Ice Trolls have been observed to live in both igloo-like structures and simple tents.
sentences.chinese: 冰霜巨魔被認爲居住在一種圓頂雪房或是簡易帳篷中。

sentences.english: The dome of St. Paul's Cathedral is well-known in London.
sentences.chinese: 聖保羅教堂的圓頂在倫敦是人人知曉的。

sentences.english: Eskimoes form igloos out of blocks of ice.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人用冰塊砌圓頂冰舍。

sentences.english: Dark hair blue yamulka, absolutely gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 黑頭髮，帶藍圓頂小帽，真是帥極了。

sentences.english: is a magnificent structure with a square base and a circular top.
sentences.chinese: 是一個擁有方底圓頂的雄偉建築。

sentences.english: Also called a yurt, the circular ger can be assembled quickly by nomadic herders making camp in harsh terrain.
sentences.chinese: 牧人在惡劣的地勢下能很快的把這個圓頂帳篷安裝好。

sentences.english: Spending a night in an igloo is magical.
sentences.chinese: 能在圓頂玻璃房裏住上一個晚上是一件很神奇的事情。

definition: tall and erect, reaching through the clouds (idiom); used to describe tall mountain or skyscraper
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
